size.$comment: size of SV in base pairs

gene_symbol.$comment: official gene symbols with transcript overlap

gene_entrez_id.$comment: Entrez gene IDs with transcript overlap

exon_symbol.$comment: official gene symbols with exon overlap

exon_entrez_id.$comment: Entrez gene IDs with exon overlap

CDS_symbol.$comment: Official gene symbols with CDS overlap

CDS_entrez_id.$comment: Entrez gene IDs with CDS overlap

gnomAD_oe_lof_upper.$comment: upper bound of gnomAD observed/expected ratio for loss of function variants

unclean_genome_percent_overlap.$comment: % overlap with segmental duplications, centromeres, and telomeres

MPO_nervous_system.$comment: mouse phenotype ontology terms related to nervous system phenotypes

HPO_nervous_system.$comment: human phenotype ontology terms related to nervous system phenotypes

CGD_disease_inheritance.$comment: gene symbols with transcript overlap in the Clinical Genomic Database

ISCA_region.$comment: genomic disease region from the International Standards for Cytogenomic Arrays database

DECIPHER_region.$comment: genomic disease region from the DECIPHER database

CG_percent_freq_MSSNG_parents.$comment: percentage of MSSNG parents sequenced on the Complete Genomics platform in which the SV is detected (50% reciprocal overlap)

putative_inheritance.$comment: putative inheritance - possible values are “Maternal”, “Paternal”, “NA” (no parents available), “Inherited_Ambiguous” (both parents have the SV), “One_parent_sequenced” (only one parent available), “Ambiguous” (inheritance is ambiguous), and “P_denovo” (putative de novo variant)

high_quality_rare.$comment: “High quality rare” if the SV meets the criteria for this, or “-” otherwise.

sample_QC.$comment: “ok”: sample passes all QC; “SV_QC_FAIL”: sample failed SV QC; “SNP_DN_QC_FAIL”: sample failed small-variant QC; “exclude”: miscellaneous problems with sample
